name: CommunitiesDNA
tag_list: community-marketing, community-building, community-design, communiy-research, community-management, community-healing, word-of-mouth-marketing, community-research, buzz-research, word-of-mouth-research
overview: CommunitiesDNA is dedicated to research and build users communities around the world, using Word of Mouth Marketing. After 26 months of worldwide research to learn about different kind of communities, @PatriciaLinares and @RolandoPeralta created a series of methodologies to research, design, build, develop, manage and rescue customers and users communities for different types of marketing and communications needs. Since 2005, CommunitiesDNA had been running projects to research communities in 5 continents and building more than 300 communities in Caribbean and Central America.
